com.pega.pegarules.pub.context

Class PRPulse<E extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pega.pegarules.pub.context.PRPulse<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PRMessage<E>, java.io.Serializable

    public class PRPulse<E extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PRMessage<E>
    A wrapper class for PRPulseMessage that contains a field for recording when this object was created (useful for monitoring when the messages contained in this object were actually published to the Hazelcast based system pulse).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • PRPulse

        public PRPulse(java.util.Collection<PRPulseMessage> aPulseMessages,
               java.lang.String originatingNodeID,
               boolean performOnOriginNode)
        Creates a PRPulse object with an initial list of messages
        Parameters:
        aPulseMessages - The PRPulseMessages to add to the pulse
        originatingNodeID - an id representing the local node. Should match the id used in the system pulse
        performOnOriginNode - true, will execute pulse message on originating node
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aPulseMessages is null
